statements: DELETE FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE patient_id = 100 AND study_name = 'Study A';
DELETE FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE study_name = 'Clinical Trial A';
DELETE FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE patient_id = 102 AND compliance_status = 'Pending';
DELETE FROM regulatory_compliance_documents WHERE doc_id = 100 AND document_type = 'Regulatory';
DELETE FROM regulatory_compliance_documents WHERE doc_id = 100 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM pharmaceutical_research WHERE research_name = 'COVID-19 Study';
DELETE FROM audit_trails WHERE event_type = 'Data Breach';
DELETE FROM study_details WHERE study_name = 'Example Study';
DELETE FROM study_details WHERE study_name = 'Clinical Trial A' AND responsible_person = 'John Doe';
